title: [Medicine] Heart injury was observed in 62.3% of COVID-19 patients, and heart structural abnormalities were present in nearly two-thirds of these patients who underwent an echocardiogram test. In-hospital mortality rate for such patients was 31.7%.

[Health] A reversible condition caused by insulin resistance (known as Metabolic Syndrome when multiple symptoms are present) increases the odds of COVID-19 mortality compared with each of those comorbidities individually
